title: Without evidence, FDA claims “misinformation” is LEADING cause of death in the USA, but won’t acknowledge deaths caused by vaccines or pharmaceuticals
cleaned_text:
Without evidence, FDA claims “misinformation” is LEADING cause of death in the USA, but won’t acknowledge deaths caused by vaccines or pharmaceuticals

According to the Food and Drug Administration (FDA), the new leading cause of death in the United States is something called “misinformation.” FDA chief Robert Califf appeared on CNN to talk about the new leading cause of death. He said, “the reliable, truthful messages are not getting across, and it’s being washed down by a lot of misinformation, which is leading people to make bad choices that are unfortunate for their health.”

While this makes sense, Mr. Califf did not mention any of the harmful government misinformation that has come out of the FDA over the past three years, and he failed to define exactly the kind of information that is leading people on a path of sickness, mental illness and death. He also failed to quantify his idea of “misinformation” with the negative health outcomes that are occurring in the American population.

FDA chief fails to explain how the FDA’s misinformation caused great suffering and death

Califf said “almost no one in this country should be dying from COVID,” but he did not explain the reasons why people have died from the infection in the first place. Furthermore, he did not explain why fatality rates are so high in hospital settings, compared to lower fatality rates in private practices where early treatment is utilized.

The FDA chief only credited “anti-virals and vaccinations” – even though the current hospital antiviral treatment for COVID often has fatal outcomes that lead to renal failure, sedation and ventilation. Califf is still lifting up vaccinations on a pedestal, completely ignoring the fact that the vaccinated are now more likely to get COVID, become hospitalized or die at the hospital. The FDA chief won’t mention antibody dependent enhancement (caused by the vaccines) because that would go against the narrative that everyone is saved when they are vaccinated multiple times a year. He didn’t mention myocarditis, blood clots, or all the cardiac events that are taking place post-vaccination, even though the FDA knew about it all when granting emergency use authorization!

He and the rest of the government health agencies are still promoting a prideful, contrived NARRATIVE, regardless of all the damning information that has come out on the covid-19 vaccines. In their desperate attempts to promote this fearful and controlling narrative, these government agencies have become cult-minded with vaccine efficacy and safety, and refuse to acknowledge the failures and the lethality of these vaccines. This is why the FDA, the CDC and the NIH have created the term “misinformation” in the first place. Any information that goes against their narrative is to be censored, so they are not charged with crimes against humanity.

Maintaining authority over the population, stripping people of their livelihoods and controlling people’s beliefs is more important than anything for the government, and this agenda makes all these rogue agencies close-minded and harmful to the population at large. The true purveyors of misinformation are the FDA, the CDC and the NIH, because they refuse to look at all the data on vaccine injuries, vaccine failure and vaccine-induced deaths. While “almost no one in this country should be dying from COVID” is a true statement, Mr. Califf needs to tell the truth about immunosuppression from government fear campaigns, pharmaceuticals, malnutrition, antibiotic overuse, chemotherapy and faulty flu vaccines. He also needs to tell the truth about why people died over the past three years from oxygen deprivation, withheld treatments, fraudulent coding, hospital-acquired infection, renal damage, sedation, isolation and lung damage.

This is the same agency that promoted lock downs, human gathering restrictions and social distancing — putting the population on a course of financial destitution, mental illness, isolation and suicide. None of the government’s controls and oppression had any efficacy at all. The FDA continues to recommend vaccines that are being exposed as lethal and destructive. The court-ordered release of the Pfizer documents proves this. The record number of deaths in the Vaccine Adverse Event Reporting System also proves this, but the prideful and arrogant FDA won’t break from the narrative. People continue to suffer and die because of this prideful medical malpractice. Even worse, the FDA knew about the problems with the vaccines when they were granting Pfizer emergency use authorization.

Perhaps, “misinformation” IS the leading cause of death. This would make the FDA largely responsible for all the destruction and death over the past year and half.
